title: How much is the difference is between 450 nits and 480 nits? Is it significant? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let’s put it this way. In a typical movie theater, the screen brightness is just 50 nits. 480 is obviously brighter than 450, but if you tend to watch TV in a semi-dark room, I doubt you will see much of a difference. Look also at the “blacks.” Brightness is good, but higher contrast is even better.
